archimate:TechnologyService.name: Broker Data Information Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Is this the same as the one on the router?
What is available? https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#get-20 GET /druid/v2/datasources GET /druid/v2/datasources/{dataSourceName} <-- is this from the cache? or announcements? GET /druid/v2/datasources/{dataSourceName}/dimensions (dep) GET /druid/v2/datasources/{dataSourceName}/metrics (dep)
